mapper.select: select pid,pname as pName,market_price as marketPrice,shop_price as shopPrice,ctid,stock,is_hot as isHot, date from product where pid=#{pid}

select pid,pname as pName,market_price as marketPrice,shop_price as shopPrice,stock,is_hot as isHot,date from product inner join category_third on product.ctid=category_third.ctid inner join category_second on category_second.csid=category_third.csid inner join category on category.cid=category_second.cid where category.cid=#{0} limit #{1},#{2}
